name: cloneVolume
description:
Creates a Volume on your Account. In order for this request to complete successfully, your User must have the `add_volumes` grant. The new Volume will have the same size and data as the source Volume. Creating a new Volume will incur a charge on your Account.
* Only Volumes with a `status` of "active" can be cloned.

volumeId.description: ID of the Volume to clone.

body.description: The requested state your Volume will be cloned into.

label.description: The Volume's label is for display purposes only.

$block: A Block Storage Volume associated with your Account.

$ul: **filesystem_path**: The full filesystem path for the Volume based on the Volume's label. Path is /dev/disk/by-id/scsi-0Linode_Volume_ + Volume label.
**hardware_type**: The storage type of this Volume.
**id**: The unique ID of this Volume.
**label**: The Volume's label is for display purposes only.
**linode_id**: If a Volume is attached to a specific Linode, the ID of that Linode will be displayed here.
**linode_label**: If a Volume is attached to a specific Linode, the label of that Linode will be displayed here.
**region**: The unique ID of this Region.
**status**: The current status of the volume.  Can be one of:
**tags**: An array of Tags applied to this object.  Tags are for organizational purposes only.
**updated**: When this Volume was last updated.
